title: Con
description: Forced to do what he had to do to survive a brutal past, Con is jaded and angry at life. When his twin is nearly killed in a car accident, he takes the first job he can find to pay for her special care needs. He tries to put the past behind him, only to find that it comes back with a vengeance to slap him in the face. Desperate and alone, he is literally brought to his knees to do what he must for her. Con finds the online sex business pretty stimulating and when a hot Dom steps up to teach him a thing or two, he finds himself extremely interested in learning more. Con obtains a world of salvation along with his freedom at DOMZ.com.
author: Patricia Logan
